About.Hours & facilities: Archives room open Thursdays during school term between 8.30am and 4.30pm. Appointment necessary. General reference assistance and copying services available.

About.Acquisition focus: The history of Sacred Heart College since its inception in 1860 by the Sisters of Mercy as a Catholic Girls College. However boys were enrolled during the 1950s to 1970s.

About.Major holdings: The school archives are mainly in-house but will accept significant documents, photographs and memorabilia for past students and staff.
